He further commended Yashasvi Jaiswal's fearless approach and KL Rahul's disciplined batting. Tendulkar advised against excessive scrutiny of Rishabh Pant's shot selection, acknowledging his impactful innings.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/sachin-tendulkar-on-what-made-shubman-gill-unstoppable-calm-composed-and-organised/articleshow/123124029.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/sachin-tendulkar-on-what-made-shubman-gill-unstoppable-calm-composed-and-organised/articleshow/123124029.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 22:45:12 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="50056" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123124128,imgsize-50056.cms"/></item><item><title>'India not good trading partner': Trump says will raise tariffs substantially in 24 hrs</title><description><![CDATA[US Presdient Donald Trump has declared his intention to significantly increase tariffs on India, citing country's purchase of Russian oil. The announcement coincided with the release of the "July Declaration," outlining proposed reforms and criticizing the previous administration. While celebrations marked the anniversary of Sheikh Hasina's ouster, Human Rights Watch raised concerns about the interim government's human rights record.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/south-asia/bangladesh-elections-before-ramadan-muhammad-yunus-announces-february-2026-election-here-are-the-details/articleshow/123122951.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/south-asia/bangladesh-elections-before-ramadan-muhammad-yunus-announces-february-2026-election-here-are-the-details/articleshow/123122951.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 21:36:14 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="585382" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123122977,imgsize-585382.cms"/></item><item><title>Jasprit Bumrah's 'what's next' post keeps fans wondering</title><description><![CDATA[India and England concluded a captivating Test series with a 2-2 draw. The final match saw India secure a narrow six-run victory at The Oval. Shubman Gill led the team, while Mohammed Siraj topped the bowling charts. Jasprit Bumrah expressed his satisfaction with the competitive series. Yashasvi Jaiswal and Harry Brook shone with centuries.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/after-ind-vs-eng-series-jasprit-bumrahs-whats-next-post-keeps-fans-wondering/articleshow/123122700.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/after-ind-vs-eng-series-jasprit-bumrahs-whats-next-post-keeps-fans-wondering/articleshow/123122700.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 21:13:35 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="56268" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123122736,imgsize-56268.cms"/></item><item><title>Angry at Mira Murati for refusing Meta's $1 Bn job offer; CEO Zuckerberg launched...</title><description><![CDATA[Meta's CEO, Mark Zuckerberg, reportedly attempted to acquire Mira Murati's startup, Thinking Machines Lab, with a $1 billion offer. After Murati declined, Zuckerberg allegedly launched a recruitment drive targeting its employees, including Andrew Tulloch, offering a potential $1.5 billion pay package.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/angry-at-mira-murati-for-refusing-metas-1-billion-job-offer-ceo-mark-zuckerberg-launched-a-full-scale-/articleshow/123121189.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/angry-at-mira-murati-for-refusing-metas-1-billion-job-offer-ceo-mark-zuckerberg-launched-a-full-scale-/articleshow/123121189.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 19:30:24 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="44662" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123121185,imgsize-44662.cms"/></item><item><title>Uttarakhand floods: At least 10 Army jawans missing in Harshil</title><description><![CDATA[Tragedy struck Uttarakhand's Uttarkashi district as cloudbursts triggered devastating flash floods in Harsil, leaving at least ten Army personnel missing. Rescue operations are underway, with the Air Force on standby to assist. The Kheer Ganga river overflowed, causing extensive damage in Dharali village, a key stop for Gangotri pilgrims.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/uttarakhand-floods-at-least-10-army-jawans-missing-helicopters-on-standby-for-rescue-operations/articleshow/123122283.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/uttarakhand-floods-at-least-10-army-jawans-missing-helicopters-on-standby-for-rescue-operations/articleshow/123122283.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 21:00:26 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1829769" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123122536,imgsize-1829769.cms"/></item><item><title>KL Rahul's powerful post for two gutsy players goes viral</title><description><![CDATA[KL Rahul lauded Rishabh Pant and Chris Woakes for their unwavering dedication and courage while playing through pain for their respective countries. Pant battled a foot injury in the fourth Test, returning to bat with a bandage and scoring a half-century. Similarly, Woakes, despite a shoulder injury, emerged to bat in the final Test, showcasing remarkable grit and determination.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/kl-rahuls-powerful-post-for-two-gutsy-players-goes-viral/articleshow/123121883.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/kl-rahuls-powerful-post-for-two-gutsy-players-goes-viral/articleshow/123121883.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 20:26:41 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="51800" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123122089,imgsize-51800.cms"/></item><item><title>From oil to outrage: How India plans to counter Trump’s tariff threat</title><description><![CDATA[Donald Trump threatened to raise tariffs on Indian goods due to continued Russian oil purchases, despite India's offer of zero tariffs on American products. This escalation could significantly impact Indian exports and derail trade negotiations. India is devising strategies, including sectoral support, dairy diplomacy, and strategic messaging, to mitigate economic fallout and stabilize relations amidst Trump's pressure.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/donald-trump-trump-tariff-on-india-indias-purchase-of-russia-oil-how-india-plans-to-counter-trump/articleshow/123121952.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/donald-trump-trump-tariff-on-india-indias-purchase-of-russia-oil-how-india-plans-to-counter-trump/articleshow/123121952.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 20:38:06 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="57530" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123122769,imgsize-57530.cms"/></item><item><title>Trump to announce new tariff plan for chips next week, says: We want them to ...</title><description><![CDATA[Donald Trump plans to impose new tariffs on semiconductor and chip imports to boost US manufacturing. This follows a Commerce Department investigation into the semiconductor market. While smartphones and computers were previously excluded from higher tariffs, these new measures aim to incentivize domestic production.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/donald-trump-says-will-announce-new-tariff-plan-for-semiconductors-and-chips-next-week-because-we-want-them-to-/articleshow/123123280.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/donald-trump-says-will-announce-new-tariff-plan-for-semiconductors-and-chips-next-week-because-we-want-them-to-/articleshow/123123280.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 22:11:34 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="44142" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123123246,imgsize-44142.cms"/></item><item><title>Delhi-Milan Air India flight aborted moments before take-off</title><description><![CDATA[Air India cancelled flight AI137 from Delhi to Milan on Tuesday due to a maintenance issue discovered in the Boeing 787 Dreamliner before takeoff. The airline is working to minimize passenger inconvenience by arranging alternative flights, hotel stays, and offering full refunds or free rescheduling. Recent weeks have seen Air India facing multiple flight disruptions due to technical problems.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/air-india-flight-cancelled-delhi-milan-flight-aborted-moments-before-take-off-technical-issue-cited/articleshow/123122328.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/air-india-flight-cancelled-delhi-milan-flight-aborted-moments-before-take-off-technical-issue-cited/articleshow/123122328.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 20:49:01 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="777678" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123122353,imgsize-777678.cms"/></item><item><title>Porto legend Jorge Costa dies aged 53</title><description><![CDATA[Jorge Costa, the former captain of Porto, tragically passed away at the age of 53 due to a cardiac arrest at the club's training ground. Tej Pratap plans to contest from Mahua. He dismissed Tejashwi contesting from Mahua. The new political development creates ripples in Bihar politics.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/patna/lalus-son-tej-pratap-forms-alliance-with-vvip/articleshow/123121165.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/patna/lalus-son-tej-pratap-forms-alliance-with-vvip/articleshow/123121165.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 19:27:25 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>JAI NARAIN PANDEY</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="226660" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123121156,imgsize-226660.cms"/></item><item><title>'Here am I. The Establishment Clause of the US Constitution prohibits government endorsement of religion. While DHS has not officially responded to requests for clarification, civil liberties groups are reportedly preparing to challenge the campaign in court.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/here-am-i-send-me-how-trump-administration-is-using-the-bible-to-justify-deportations/articleshow/123120280.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/here-am-i-send-me-how-trump-administration-is-using-the-bible-to-justify-deportations/articleshow/123120280.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 19:12:29 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="194386" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123120306,imgsize-194386.cms"/></item><item><title>Forgiveness for some: Trump limits student loan relief except for ICE agents</title><description><![CDATA[In America, the Trump administration is changing student loan forgiveness. Critics call it hypocrisy. The administration is also dismantling the SAVE Plan. This shift impacts Indian students pursuing education in the US.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/news/forgiveness-for-some-debt-for-the-rest-trump-limits-student-load-relief-except-for-ice-agents/articleshow/123121032.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/news/forgiveness-for-some-debt-for-the-rest-trump-limits-student-load-relief-except-for-ice-agents/articleshow/123121032.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 21:00:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>LAKSHIMA SAREEN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="228336" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123121163,imgsize-228336.cms"/></item><item><title>Trinity Rodman shines: Magic Johnson praises Dennis Rodman’s daughter</title><description><![CDATA[Trinity Rodman marked her return from injury with a stunning game-winning goal for the Washington Spirit against the Portland Thorns, electrifying fans and earning praise from part-owner Magic Johnson. The trio then attended WWE SummerSlam at MetLife Stadium, where Wilson received a custom Giants-themed wrestling belt. Despite the warm welcome, the crowd unexpectedly booed Wilson when he appeared on the jumbotron.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/russell-wilson-skips-family-time-with-ciara-for-sons-only-brunch-before-getting-booed-at-wwe-summerslam/articleshow/123084485.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/russell-wilson-skips-family-time-with-ciara-for-sons-only-brunch-before-getting-booed-at-wwe-summerslam/articleshow/123084485.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 04 Aug 2025 07:28:22 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="109690" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123084506,imgsize-109690.cms"/></item><item><title>Connor McDavid to Bruins: Insiders say move could guarantee Cup</title><description><![CDATA[Speculation intensifies around Connor McDavid's future as contract talks stall with the Edmonton Oilers. Bruins insiders boldly predict a Stanley Cup victory if McDavid joins their ranks, deeming him a 'cheat code' akin to LeBron James in his prime.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nhl/news/connor-mcdavid-trade-bombshell-to-the-bruins-nhl-insiders-say-it-could-guarantee-a-stanley-cup-win/articleshow/123077767.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nhl/news/connor-mcdavid-trade-bombshell-to-the-bruins-nhl-insiders-say-it-could-guarantee-a-stanley-cup-win/articleshow/123077767.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 04 Aug 2025 05:08:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="45540" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123077764,imgsize-45540.cms"/></item><item><title>High on tariff war: 250 per cent! Trump warns of incoming pharma duties</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/international-business/high-on-tariff-war-250-per-cent-donald-trump-warns-of-incoming-pharma-duties/articleshow/123120389.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/international-business/high-on-tariff-war-250-per-cent-donald-trump-warns-of-incoming-pharma-duties/articleshow/123120389.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 19:06:21 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="73574" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123120847,imgsize-73574.cms"/></item><item><title>‘Cultural misunderstanding 101’: Indian family’s havan in Texas invites firefighters</title><description><![CDATA[A Hindu housewarming ceremony in Texas took an unexpected turn when the Bedford fire department arrived, mistaking the traditional havan for a fire emergency. Viral footage shows firefighters inspecting the scene as the family performed the ritual.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/nri/cultural-misunderstanding-101-indian-familys-havan-in-texas-invites-firefighters-watch-video/articleshow/123119905.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/nri/cultural-misunderstanding-101-indian-familys-havan-in-texas-invites-firefighters-watch-video/articleshow/123119905.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 18:54:56 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="4648310" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123120246,imgsize-4648310.cms"/></item><item><title>Hulk Hogan snubbed grandkids: Brooke’s husband speaks out — ‘no interest’</title><description><![CDATA[Just days before his death at 71 from cardiac arrest, WWE icon Hulk Hogan reportedly reconciled with his estranged daughter, Brooke. Hogan was also battling chronic lymphocytic leukemia.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/wwe/top-stories/hulk-hogan-reportedly-begged-forgiveness-from-estranged-daughter-brooke-in-last-tearful-conversation-before-death/articleshow/123119168.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/wwe/top-stories/hulk-hogan-reportedly-begged-forgiveness-from-estranged-daughter-brooke-in-last-tearful-conversation-before-death/articleshow/123119168.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 17:41:17 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="649640" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123119189,imgsize-649640.cms"/></item><item><title>Kerala schools plan to scrap backbenches: What this quiet reform could mean for classroom learning</title><description><![CDATA[Kerala is set to eliminate traditional backbenches in state-run schools, aiming to boost student confidence and equity. Inspired partly by the Malayalam film Sthanarthi Sreekuttan, the move challenges classroom hierarchies by promoting inclusive seating like U-shaped layouts. An expert panel will recommend alternatives as the state rethinks how physical space impacts learning outcomes and emotional wellbeing.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/news/kerala-schools-plan-to-scrap-backbenches-what-this-quiet-reform-could-mean-for-classroom-learning/articleshow/123114661.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/news/kerala-schools-plan-to-scrap-backbenches-what-this-quiet-reform-could-mean-for-classroom-learning/articleshow/123114661.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 14:09:42 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>APEKSHA TANWAR</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="34220" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123114660,imgsize-34220.cms"/></item><item><title>Voter list lapse: ECI suspends 4 Bengal officers over fake entries</title><description><![CDATA[The Election Commission of India took action against officials in West Bengal. Four officials got suspended for sharing elector roll database credentials. They shared it with unauthorized people. The action followed reports of wrongful additions to electoral rolls in Baruipur Purba. Disciplinary proceedings and FIRs are expected. This is due to potential criminal misconduct.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/voter-list-lapse-eci-suspends-4-bengal-officers-over-fake-entries-accused-of-sharing-passwords-to-database/articleshow/123119355.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/voter-list-lapse-eci-suspends-4-bengal-officers-over-fake-entries-accused-of-sharing-passwords-to-database/articleshow/123119355.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 18:16:56 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="40236" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123120082,imgsize-40236.cms"/></item><item><title>15-year-old girl out for snacks shot dead in market by ‘boyfriend’</title><description><![CDATA[In a tragic incident in Delhi's Jahangirpuri, a 15-year-old girl was fatally shot by her 20-year-old boyfriend in a crowded market area. The accused, who is currently absconding, allegedly fired multiple rounds at the girl in front of a clinic, leading to her death.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/delhi/15-year-old-girl-shot-dead-in-market-boyfriend-suspect/articleshow/123101798.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/delhi/15-year-old-girl-shot-dead-in-market-boyfriend-suspect/articleshow/123101798.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 04 Aug 2025 23:22:51 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="15392" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123107776,imgsize-15392.cms"/></item><item><title>Why the Delhi School Education Bill is facing sharp criticism: A closer look at the 15% clause</title><description><![CDATA[The Delhi School Education Fee Regulation Bill, 2025, proposes a three-tier oversight system to regulate private school fee hikes. Though billed as a transparency measure, it faces criticism over a clause allowing up to 15% annual fee hikes without external approval. Parents’ groups argue the provision empowers school managements disproportionately, risking further commercialisation in education.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/news/why-the-delhi-school-education-bill-is-facing-sharp-criticism-a-closer-look-at-the-15-clause/articleshow/123113903.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/news/why-the-delhi-school-education-bill-is-facing-sharp-criticism-a-closer-look-at-the-15-clause/articleshow/123113903.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 13:29:51 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI Education</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="10208" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123113927,imgsize-10208.cms"/></item><item><title>Massive cloudburst in Uttarakhand: Entire village swept away; 4 dead, several missing</title><description><![CDATA[A cloudburst-triggered flash flood in Uttarkashi's Dharali village caused widespread devastation, sweeping away homes, shops, and roads. Rescue teams, including SDRF and Army personnel, are on-site conducting relief operations amid fears that laborers may be trapped. The Meteorological Department has issued warnings for continued heavy rainfall across Uttarakhand, particularly in hilly areas, until August 10.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/dehradun/uttarakhand-cloudburst-flash-floods-hit-uttarkashi-several-villagers-washed-away/articleshow/123115132.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/dehradun/uttarakhand-cloudburst-flash-floods-hit-uttarkashi-several-villagers-washed-away/articleshow/123115132.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 14:34:43 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="2608966" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123115388,imgsize-2608966.cms"/></item><item><title>Tougher checks for marriage-based Green Cards: US issues guidelines</title><description><![CDATA[USCIS has updated its policy manual to combat marriage fraud in family-based immigration, prompted by concerns over fraudulent applications and national security risks. The updated policy mandates comprehensive evidence of bona fide marriages and rigorous interviews. Individuals convicted of marriage fraud face imprisonment, fines, and deportation, reflecting stricter scrutiny and vetting procedures.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/international-business/tougher-checks-for-marriage-based-green-cards-us-issues-fresh-guidelines-to-detect-fraud-all-you-need-to-about-the-new-policy/articleshow/123117342.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/international-business/tougher-checks-for-marriage-based-green-cards-us-issues-fresh-guidelines-to-detect-fraud-all-you-need-to-about-the-new-policy/articleshow/123117342.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 16:14:22 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="450755" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123117416,imgsize-450755.cms"/></item><item><title>'Right to choose': Russia backs India, rebukes Trump's tariff threat over crude oil</title><description><![CDATA[The Kremlin has defended India's right to choose its trading partners, criticizing Trump's threat to raise tariffs over Russian oil imports. India has rebuffed Trump's warning as "unjustified," asserting its oil purchases are driven by market conditions. India vowed to protect its interests, noting that the US and EU also trade with Russia.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/international-business/right-to-choose-after-india-russia-rebukes-trumps-tariff-threat-over-crude-oil-calls-it-illegitimate-in-strong-reaction/articleshow/123116428.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/international-business/right-to-choose-after-india-russia-rebukes-trumps-tariff-threat-over-crude-oil-calls-it-illegitimate-in-strong-reaction/articleshow/123116428.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 15:57:38 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="30386" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123117079,imgsize-30386.cms"/></item><item><title>'Trump negotiating ceasefire baseless': Ex-India cricketer takes dig at England legend</title><description><![CDATA[Former Indian cricketer Wasim Jaffer has humorously dismissed viral rumours suggesting that Donald Trump intervened to broker peace between him and Michael Vaughan. Jaffer clarified on X that the reports are baseless, confirming that the social media banter with the former England captain will continue.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/donald-trump-negotiating-a-ceasefire-is-baseless-says-ex-india-cricketer-takes-dig-at-england-legend/articleshow/123120511.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/donald-trump-negotiating-a-ceasefire-is-baseless-says-ex-india-cricketer-takes-dig-at-england-legend/articleshow/123120511.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 19:05:44 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="44142" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123120841,imgsize-44142.cms"/></item><item><title>Meet space hurricanes: Polar plasma storms disrupt GPS; pose stealth threat to satellite</title><description><![CDATA[Space hurricanes, unlike typical geomagnetic disturbances, are stealthy threats to satellite systems, forming even when the sun is quiet. These swirling plasma vortices disrupt GPS accuracy, scramble satellite signals, and distort Earth’s magnetic field without warning. Their ability to bypass normal forecasting models makes them a hidden threat to global navigation and communication infrastructure, especially in remote polar regions.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/science/what-are-space-hurricanes-and-how-can-they-sabotage-your-gps/articleshow/123120733.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/science/what-are-space-hurricanes-and-how-can-they-sabotage-your-gps/articleshow/123120733.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 19:00:21 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SCIENCE DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="23972" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123120755,imgsize-23972.cms"/></item><item><title>Man films lion devouring prey; predator turns and charges at him – watch video</title><description><![CDATA[A viral video captured a man's reckless encounter with a lion as he approached the animal devouring its prey to film it. The lion, sensing the intrusion, reacted aggressively, briefly pushing the man. The incident sparked outrage online, with many criticizing the man's dangerous stunt and highlighting the potential consequences for both human and animal safety.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/man-films-lion-devouring-prey-predator-turns-and-charges-at-him-watch-video/articleshow/123116457.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/man-films-lion-devouring-prey-predator-turns-and-charges-at-him-watch-video/articleshow/123116457.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 16:06:07 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="4629251" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123116683,imgsize-4629251.cms"/></item><item><title>Travis Kelce’s ‘dealbreaker’ resurfaces: clip stirs Taylor Swift buzz — fans spot red flag</title><description><![CDATA[A video of Kansas City Chiefs' Travis Kelce from 2016 resurfaced. Before Taylor Swift, Kelce revealed his dating preferences. He appeared on 'Watch What Happens Live' and shared his views on relationships. Kelce said that being selfie-obsessed was a dealbreaker for him. The clip went viral as Kelce enjoys superstardom. His old remarks are now headline news.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/travis-kelces-unexpected-dating-dealbreaker-resurfaced-clip-sparks-fresh-taylor-swift-buzz/articleshow/123121086.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/travis-kelces-unexpected-dating-dealbreaker-resurfaced-clip-sparks-fresh-taylor-swift-buzz/articleshow/123121086.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 19:28:05 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="27670" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123121164,imgsize-27670.cms"/></item><item><title>US announces new visa rules! Business travellers may have to pay $15,000 in bonds soon</title><description><![CDATA[The Donald Trump administration is reviving a policy requiring visitors from countries with high visa overstay rates to pay bonds up to $15,000 for B-1 and B-2 visas. This year-long pilot program aims to ensure visitors depart on time.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/international-business/us-announces-new-visa-rules-some-business-travellers-tourists-may-have-to-pay-15000-in-bonds-soon-check-trump-administrations-latest-move/articleshow/123098597.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/international-business/us-announces-new-visa-rules-some-business-travellers-tourists-may-have-to-pay-15000-in-bonds-soon-check-trump-administrations-latest-move/articleshow/123098597.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 04 Aug 2025 20:16:31 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="39268" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123098647,imgsize-39268.cms"/></item><item><title>IND vs ENG: 'Dominate' - Gautam Gambhir's bold message to Team India after victory in The Oval</title><description><![CDATA[Gautam Gambhir's leadership and Shubman Gill's captaincy inspired India to a thrilling six-run victory at The Oval, drawing the Test series 2-2. Mohammed Siraj's five-wicket haul secured the win, India's narrowest ever in Test history. This triumph boosted India to third in the ICC World Test Championship standings, highlighting the team's evolving identity and promising future.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-dominate-gautam-gambhirs-bold-message-to-team-india-after-victory-in-the-oval/articleshow/123118900.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-dominate-gautam-gambhirs-bold-message-to-team-india-after-victory-in-the-oval/articleshow/123118900.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 17:21:37 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="73972" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123118941,imgsize-73972.cms"/></item><item><title>Father-in-law tips off cops about booze party in Surat hotel; all arrested</title><description><![CDATA[Surat police raided a hotel party at 'Weekend Address' following a tip about liquor consumption, arresting six individuals, including two female artists and four businessmen. The raid, triggered by a family dispute where a man reported his daughter-in-law's presence, led to the seizure of liquor and glasses.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/surat/father-in-law-tips-cops-off-about-booze-party-daughter-in-law-was-attending/articleshow/123103099.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/surat/father-in-law-tips-cops-off-about-booze-party-daughter-in-law-was-attending/articleshow/123103099.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 00:07:41 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="88190" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123115550,imgsize-88190.cms"/></item><item><title>Parliament extends President's Rule in Manipur by 6 months</title><description><![CDATA[Rajya Sabha approved extending President's Rule in Manipur for six more months due to ongoing unrest. Union minister Nityanand Rai moved the resolution, previously passed by Lok Sabha. This decision follows N Biren Singh's resignation as chief minister amidst violence between Meitei and Kuki-Zomi communities, displacing thousands.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/constitutional-obligation-parliament-extends-presidents-rule-in-manipur-by-6-months-effective-from-august-13/articleshow/123115142.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/constitutional-obligation-parliament-extends-presidents-rule-in-manipur-by-6-months-effective-from-august-13/articleshow/123115142.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 14:29:58 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="68914" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123115988,imgsize-68914.cms"/></item><item><title>To dodge Rs 6k bill, youths fake bone in veg biryani at Gorakhpur restaurant</title><description><![CDATA[In Gorakhpur, a group of young men tried to avoid paying their restaurant bill. They falsely claimed a bone was in their vegetarian biryani. The restaurant staff checked the CCTV footage. The footage revealed the youths planting the bone themselves. Police arrived to maintain order. No formal complaint has been filed by either party in this incident at Biryani Bae.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/varanasi/youths-caught-faking-bone-in-veg-biryani-to-skip-bill/articleshow/123102460.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/varanasi/youths-caught-faking-bone-in-veg-biryani-to-skip-bill/articleshow/123102460.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 04 Aug 2025 23:44:49 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="987756" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123110426,imgsize-987756.cms"/></item><item><title>DU CSAS round 3 seat allocation results released: Check direct link to download list here</title><description><![CDATA[Delhi University has announced the Round 3 seat allocation for undergraduate admissions on August 5, 2025. The final seat allotment list, including special categories, will be released on August 13.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/news/delhi-university-csas-round-3-seat-allocation-results-released-check-direct-link-to-download-list-here/articleshow/123118947.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/news/delhi-university-csas-round-3-seat-allocation-results-released-check-direct-link-to-download-list-here/articleshow/123118947.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 17:18:32 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI Education</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="558356" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123118973,imgsize-558356.cms"/></item><item><title>CBSE Class 10 Supplementary Result 2025 released: Check marksheet</title><description><![CDATA[The CBSE declared the Class 10 Supplementary Exam Result 2025 on August 5, accessible on official websites and platforms like DigiLocker. Out of 1,38,898 students, 67,620 passed, resulting in an overall pass percentage of 48.68%. The board has announced the schedule for verification of marks, scanned copies of answer sheets, and re-evaluation, with online applications available soon.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/news/cbse-class-10-supplementary-result-2025-released-at-cbse-gov-in-check-direct-link-to-download-marksheet-here/articleshow/123117591.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/news/cbse-class-10-supplementary-result-2025-released-at-cbse-gov-in-check-direct-link-to-download-marksheet-here/articleshow/123117591.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 16:18:19 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI Education</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="504681" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123117608,imgsize-504681.cms"/></item><item><title>25 baby cobras in 15 days: MP school shuts classrooms; digs floors to end snake scare</title><description><![CDATA[A government girls' school in Madhya Pradesh is grappling with a cobra infestation, as 25 baby cobras have been found in the last two weeks. The alarming situation has forced the school to close classrooms, disrupting lessons for over 1000 students. Authorities are working to seal potential snake nests and ensure the safety of everyone.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/bhopal/25-baby-cobras-found-inside-mp-school-forcing-classroom-closures/articleshow/123103747.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/bhopal/25-baby-cobras-found-inside-mp-school-forcing-classroom-closures/articleshow/123103747.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 00:40:54 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="23858" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123110290,imgsize-23858.cms"/></item><item><title>'Poora khol ... ': Owaisi's explosive comment on Mohammed Siraj</title><description><![CDATA[India secured a thrilling six-run victory against England in the final Test at The Oval, drawing the Anderson-Tendulkar Trophy series 2-2. Mohammed Siraj's outstanding five-wicket haul in the second innings was pivotal, earning him Player of the Match. Shubman Gill, stepping in as captain, also shone, receiving the Player of the Series award for his exceptional performance.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/asaduddin-owaisis-explosive-comment-on-mohammed-siraj/articleshow/123116438.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/asaduddin-owaisis-explosive-comment-on-mohammed-siraj/articleshow/123116438.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 15:40:52 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="68878" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123116715,imgsize-68878.cms"/></item><item><title>'She’s human too': Christian Coleman defends girlfriend Sha’Carri Richardson</title><description><![CDATA[Sha’Carri Richardson's arrest at Seattle airport after a dispute with Christian Coleman sparked headlines, but Coleman's empathetic response shifted the focus. He downplayed the incident, emphasizing Richardson's struggles and his decision not to press charges.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/international-sports/christian-coleman-defends-shacarri-richardson-following-airport-arrest-amid-domestic-dispute/articleshow/123118331.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/international-sports/christian-coleman-defends-shacarri-richardson-following-airport-arrest-amid-domestic-dispute/articleshow/123118331.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 17:13:15 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>POULAMI BHATTACHARYA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="41050" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123118864,imgsize-41050.cms"/></item><item><title>Moon reactor by 2030: Nasa’s 100-kilowatt power plan; China-Russia lunar race heats up</title><description><![CDATA[The US aims to build a nuclear reactor on the Moon by 2030. Sean Duffy leads this project for lunar energy independence. This plan counters China and Russia's lunar base. The reactor will power habitats and resource extraction. NASA also plans to replace the International Space Station. Contracts will be awarded to private companies.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/science/nasa-to-build-moon-reactor-by-2030-outpacing-china-russia-lunar-ambitions-with-a-100-kilowatt-power-system/articleshow/123118414.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/science/nasa-to-build-moon-reactor-by-2030-outpacing-china-russia-lunar-ambitions-with-a-100-kilowatt-power-system/articleshow/123118414.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 16:59:43 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SCIENCE DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="38186" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123118478,imgsize-38186.cms"/></item><item><title>Black rain alert twice in 6 hrs: Hong Kong flights delayed, public services hit</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/rest-of-world/black-rain-alert-issued-twice-in-6-hrs-heavy-rains-batter-hong-kong-flights-delayed-public-services-hit/articleshow/123114792.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/rest-of-world/black-rain-alert-issued-twice-in-6-hrs-heavy-rains-batter-hong-kong-flights-delayed-public-services-hit/articleshow/123114792.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 15:32:26 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="2338347" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123115848,imgsize-2338347.cms"/></item><item><title>'Carried India without Virat, Rohit': Ex-Pak cricketer's remark on Shubman</title><description><![CDATA[Danish Kaneria lauded India's Test series performance against England, praising Shubman Gill's leadership in the absence of senior players. Akash Deep's crucial 66 and Jaiswal's century significantly contributed to India's thrilling victory, securing a 2-2 series draw.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/carried-india-without-virat-kohli-rohit-sharma-ex-pakistan-cricketers-jaw-dropping-remark-on-shubman-gill/articleshow/123118050.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/carried-india-without-virat-kohli-rohit-sharma-ex-pakistan-cricketers-jaw-dropping-remark-on-shubman-gill/articleshow/123118050.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 16:51:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="30216" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123118261,imgsize-30216.cms"/></item></channel></rss>

    <item>
      <title><![CDATA[Tata Group loses $120 billion in market value amid tariffs, IT slowdown]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/market/stocks/tata-group-loses-120-billion-in-market-value-amid-tariffs-it-slowdown-19649176.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[The group’s crown jewel, Tata Consultancy Services (TCS), has been the biggest casualty, losing nearly $70 billion in market value since September last year. Tata Motors is the second-largest contributor to the group’s market cap erosion, with a decline of around $21 billion. Together, these two companies account for nearly 75% of the total erosion in market value over the past year.]]></description>

      <title><![CDATA[No interim US-India trade deal yet; Indian exporters brace for 20-25% tariffs as August 1 deadline nears]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/world/india-us-trade-deal-delay-trump-tariffs-impact-exporters-19644819.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Indian exporters are gearing up for possible US tariffs of 20–25% as the August 1 deadline set by President Trump approaches without an interim trade deal. While the tariff uncertainty has stalled orders, industry leaders say Indian exporters remain competitively placed compared to rivals like Bangladesh and China. Exporters expect the tariffs to impact profit margins more than supply chains, with fresh orders likely once clarity emerges post-deadline. Trade talks are set to resume in August as both countries work toward a broader agreement.]]></description>
      <pubDate><![CDATA[Mon, 28 Jul 2025 23:11:22 +0530]]></pubDate>
      <dc:creator>Swapnil Deshpande</dc:creator>
      <guid><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/world/india-us-trade-deal-delay-trump-tariffs-impact-exporters-19644819.htm]]></guid>
      <category><![CDATA[Business]]></category>
      <media:content height="675" width="1200" medium="image" url="https://images.cnbctv18.com/uploads/2021/03/IndiaUS_flag.jpg"/>
    </item>

      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/market/earnings/mphasis-q1-fy26-results-ai-deals-margin-outlook-19644060.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Mphasis is targeting growth at twice the industry rate, driven by a record $760 million in Q1 deal wins and a strong AI-led pipeline. CEO Nitin Rakesh told CNBC-TV18 that 68% of the company’s pipeline is AI-related, while CFO Aravind Viswanathan confirmed margins remained stable at 15.3% despite ongoing investments. The company sees both applied AI and large deal momentum as key growth levers.]]></description>

    <item>
      <title><![CDATA[KFin Tech maintains FY26 growth guidance despite weak Q1 performance]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/market/earnings/kfin-tech-q1-results-fy26-guidance-ascent-acquisition-global-expansion-19644048.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[KFin Technologies is holding firm on its FY26 revenue growth guidance of 18–20% despite a weak Q1, with CEO Sreekanth Nadella pointing to seasonal trends and upcoming integration of Ascent Fund Services as key tailwinds. “Q2, Q3, and Q4 are typically much stronger,” he said, adding that yield compression in mutual funds is a strategic trade-off to support client growth. The Ascent deal is expected to add over $20 million in annual revenue and diversify KFin’s global footprint.]]></description>
      <pubDate><![CDATA[Sat, 26 Jul 2025 19:28:50 +0530]]></pubDate>
      <dc:creator>Swapnil Deshpande</dc:creator>

      <category><![CDATA[Business]]></category>
      <media:content height="675" width="1200" medium="image" url="https://images.cnbctv18.com/uploads/2023/12/kfin-technologies.jpeg"/>
    </item>

      <description><![CDATA[Franchise-led expansion has been the key driver behind Thyrocare’s strong Q1 performance, with CEO Rahul Guha attributing the 23% revenue growth and 60% profit surge to the addition of 1,500 new franchisees over the past year. Speaking to CNBC-TV18, Guha said the company continues to prioritise affordability, with most gains coming from volume and test mix rather than price hikes.]]></description>
